title: Bound in Cabo
description: Holly feels like she’s won the lottery.She has a Silver Fox for a boyfriend, they’ve dropped the L word, and now he’s treating her to an all expenses paid trip to Cabo.What more could a girl want?Well, Nick hopes she wants to take the next step.He’s got the perfect girl, that special something is burning a hole in his pocket, and the stage is set for a certain question to be popped.If everything goes according to plan, Nick and Holly could be bound for forever.
author: Dana Isaly
